name: Cosmic Whale
description:
⭐💫💫⭐
Cetus, the constellation of the Whale. Thrown into the sky by the hero Perseus, it now guides your way home. Connect the stars and hop in your spaceship. There's still a long way to go.⭐💫💫⭐

Cosmic Whale is a small puzzle platformer. Use your ability of connecting stars to create paths and reach your UFO at the end of each level. But beware! Dangerous space jellyfish will try to block your way.

Collect whale tokens to unlock new levels and complete the constellation. Keep an eye out for hidden secrets, too. Some might be a little tricky to reach.

⭐ ~ Controls ~ ⭐

MovementWASD or Arrow KeysJumpSpaceConnect starsLeft ClickDeselect current starClick anywhereReset created pathsAt a checkpoint of the same colour, press ReturnPauseESC or PToggle free cameraQ

A game by Iván, Luis & Mawyn. We hope you enjoy it!
